channel.title: ::kill issues please help

item.title: ::kill issues please help
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

ok i tried yours i had errors but i fixed now it works but problem is the target loses their item, does anyone know how to make it so they dont lose anything? i tried looking for the public void for it but couldnt find please help here is my new code

} if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights >= 2){ { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); int deaths = -1; int timer = 0; if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p= (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.youdied(); p.sM("You have been killed by "+playerName+"."); if (p != null) { client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client stillgfx(383, absY, absX); } } else youdied(); } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::kill issues please help
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

heres my code, hope it helps.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“czar y2k”))
{
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
int deaths = 0;
int timer = 0;

		if (otherPIndex != -1) 
			{
                    client f = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
					f.youdied();
					f.sM("You have been killed by "+playerName+". Faggot.");
					if (f != null) 
					{ // weeds out the nulls from our function
					client castOn = (client) f; // specific player's client
					stillgfx(383, absY, absX);
					}
			}
			else
			youdied();
}[/code]

item.title: ::kill issues please help
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

Ok i added a command called ::kill and when you do it, the target does the dieng emote with a fire blast gfx and is sent to home but the problem is when lets say i do it to “bob” it sends a message to bob saying you have been killed by “me” but the whole dieng part and stuff happens to me. so isntead of him dieng i die but he gets the message. can anyone please help so that it makes him die not me here is the code

} if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights == 3){ try { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; toX = 3093; toY = 3492; setAnimation(532); lowGFX(346,0); p.sM("You have been killed by " + playerName + "!"); } else { sM("That name does not exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Error in the kill command!"); } }

Read full topic
